author: Special Correspondent
text:
A Static Surveillance Team attached to the Tiruchi East Assembly constituency seized 15 ‘kamakshi’ lamps that were being taken in a vehicle without proper documents here on Wednesday evening.

The team members stopped the vehicle at Sembattu check post and found the lamps inside. The vehicle occupant Kamaraj who was proceeding from Mathur in Pudukottai district reportedly informed the team that the lamps were taken to Samayapuram. Official sources said the lamps were seized since proper documents relating to its purchase were not carried. The seized items were later handed over to the Sub Treasury here.
title: Surveillance team seizes lamps in Tiruchi
